about_the_game:
About This:

Insider threat is a first-person survival horror game. The game takes place in a scientific complex located somewhere lost in the universe. The plot tells the story of one of the patients who has survived the latest events that occurred in the complex. After waking up alone and disoriented, you will soon discover the terrible experiments that were being carried out in this strange place.

Immerse yourself in an environment full of danger and constant tension while you meet objectives that will allow you to escape threats.

Helpless and disoriented, you will have to manage to obtain the necessary resources to be able to explore the other parts of the scientific complex and try to get out alive.


Important note:

This game focuses on exploration and achieving certain objectives. During its course you must solve the enigma that will allow you to complete the story. Your mission will be to overcome all the obstacles that come your way until you escape from the place. Be careful because its constant tension will favor a more realistic and deeper experience for the player.


Insider Threatis a first-person survival horror game.

Environment

The game takes place inside a scientific complex located in an unknown location. Under a dark and sinister atmosphere you must explore each of the different sections of the complex without ever neglecting your back, it could be that something is stalking you.

The theme of the game

The game tells the events that occurred in a scientific complex lost in the universe. Its protagonist is a patient who wakes up disoriented and has to discover what has happened in this place. Throughout the game, you will have to be very focused on your surroundings since you may not be the only inhabitant of the complex.

Developer comment:
This game may not harm you fisically, but it can harm your psychology. It is our recommendation for people who have fear of the dark, heart problems and fear of being alone to play with caution.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages. Frequent violence or gore.
